## IControllerWheelEvent interface

Wheel (scroll) event for camera controllers.

Extends a mouse event with wheel delta values for scroll-based input (e.g., zoom).

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface IControllerWheelEvent extends IControllerMouseEvent<'wheel'> 
```
**Extends:** [IControllerMouseEvent](doc/markdown/./scene.icontrollermouseevent.md)<!-- -->&lt;'wheel'&gt;
